author: Nigel Slater
method: Combine all the vegetables in a bowl with the soured cream and nigella seeds.  Stir and serve.
ingredients: 2 fennel bulbs, shredded,  Â½ small red cabbage, shredded,  4 beetroot, peeled and shredded,  4 spring onions, chopped,  6 tbsp soured cream,  3 tbsp nigella seeds
